Title: Twist of Fate
Plot: When nature's wrath causes life to take an unexpected turn, split-second decisions can mean the difference between life and death, and survival in brutal weather conditions can rely on a simple twist of fate. Some stories featured in the series are about commuters stuck on a Chicago road for more than 18 hours during a blizzard and a couple forced to live off of jellybeans and water from melting snow in Washington, whose only hope lies in the hands of a passer-by.
